ModMetaData.name: Bulk Stonecutting
ModMetaData.author: Fuglypump
ModMetaData.description:
Adds new bills to the Stonecutter's table which cuts 3 chunks at a time. *No research required*
Notes: - Load this mod **AFTER** the mod called "Cupro's Stones" if you have it. - Cutting 3 chunks at once creates 60 blocks and costs 15% less work than cutting single chunks at a time. - Should be safe to add and remove to your saved games, just make sure you delete the bulk bills before uninstalling.
